name: Cubes VS. Dots
description:
There are two cubes in the game one of them is blue and the other is orange they are avoiding from dots 

P1 ->  Moves with arrows
P2-> Moves with WASD
Key -> there is a key if both player get in the key the block will remove and player will countinue to level
Finish P1 , Finish P2 -> There are two finish spot for each of them is special for player they it should match with color to finish the level
